members.name: rangedAttack
members.comment: Attack the specified entity using a ranged attack.

param: charge - How "charged" the attack is (how far back the bow was pulled for Bow attacks). This should be a value between 0 and 1, represented as targetDistance/maxDistance.

members.name: setChargingAttack
members.comment: Sets that the Entity is "charging" up an attack, by raising its hands

param: raiseHands - Whether the entities hands are raised to charge attack

members.name: isChargingAttack
members.comment: Alias to LivingEntity.isHandRaised(), if the entity is charging an attack
